23628.contextString: Mr. Pelzer, the professor of the guitar
23628.contextBroader: I saw him on this subject early in November, when he finally proposed referring it to Mr. Pelzer, the professor of the guitar; a friend of his, and an entire stranger to me*®, then accidentally present, 5th. That gentleman positively declared, that there could be no doubt of Mr. Linley’s composition having been taken from mine; at the same time he expressed his belief, that this bad happened by accident, 6th. Mr. Linley proposed stating on his. song, that my quartett had been composed first.
